# wrap() function
<!-- Do not edit this file. It is automatically generated by API Documenter. -->

[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@esdmr/assert/assert](./esdmr.assert.assert.md) &gt; [wrap](./esdmr.assert.assert.wrap.md)


Wraps any thrown value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function wrap(thrownValue: unknown, message?: string, ...args: unknown[]): WrappedError;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  thrownValue | unknown | The value to wrap. |
|  message | string | The message to include in the error. Formatted with <code>{}</code>. |
|  args | unknown\[\] | Format arguments. |

<b>Returns:</b>

WrappedError
